mainmatter.p: Given a short exact sequence of chain complexes 0 \to A_ \bullet \to B_ \bullet \to C_ \bullet \to 0, there is a long exact sequence of homology groups \cdots \to H_{n+1}(C) \xrightarrow { \partial } H_n(A) \to H_n (B) \to H_n (C) \xrightarrow { \partial } H_{n-1} (A) \to \cdots The map \partial here is, after unpacking some quotients, simply the boundary map B_n \to B_{n-1}.
